So I work a lot on um management problems, how to manage disease um and how to predict its spatial spread especially in wildlife populations and at the wildlife livestock interface. And my current focus as I mentioned is rabies virus and understanding reservoir species movement uh to help facilitate uh rabies management in the United States. We're also interested in spillover from the standpoint of how rabies um ecological side of how rabies variants jump hosts and move into from one host to another.
